name: XML Model Viewer
short_description: The project is designed to be implemented in Java, for cross platform availability. The main aspect is xml representation for easy viewing and editing. It should be implemented so that the xml can be viewed as a graph or diagram. The functionality should have selecting of specific parts of the diagram, zoom in/out, that only specific type of xml nodes should be visible, basic functionality of adding and removing nodes, xml schema validation, adding rule to xml schema based on new type of node inserted in xml. It should have Parser selection part, and xml schema editing part.
